answers.answer: I'm so sorry to here that.  Dr. John Lee's book--What Your Doctor May Not Tell You About Menopause may be able to help you. Although you're not menopausal, he talks about polycystic ovaries.  Also talk to your doctor or GYN about taking Metformin.   It's a med for diabetes but is helpful for PCOS.Take careBrenda
